attributes.action: Stop individual sales of fireworks in retail shops
attributes.additional_details:
Increased injuries 
Used as weapons to emergency services
Public safety issues
Continued misuse before and after Nov 5th in residential area
attributes.background: To ban all sales of fireworks in retail stores.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Ban all fireworks permanently, including displays.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626850
